title: Build Microservices in Apache Cassandra‚Ñ¢ , with Java
description:
During this 2H session you will implement a todo application REST backend for Apache Cassandra in JAVA (https://www.todobackend.com/). This workshop was recorded live. Some live elements have been cut out for your enjoyment. Be sure to make use of the timestamps below. Enjoy!

0:00 Introduction 
3:13 Getting Set up 
7:33 ToDoApplications 
23:38 Hands-on Exercise: Running a ToDo App 
25:18 Connecting to AstraDB 
27:10 Hands-on Exercise: Create an AstraDB Instance  
45:22 Connectivity to Cassandra 
54:10 CRUD Repositories (Data Models and Queries) 
1:08:37 Hands-on Exercise: CRUD Repositories 
1:32:30 Spring Data 
1:35:20 Hands-on Exercise: Spring Data 
1:43:27 Wrap-up and Resources

‚ùìJoin us on DISCORD for questions and FUN
https://discord.gg/U4hFGvC

üì• Materials for today is ;
https://github.com/DataStax-Academy/microservices-java-workshop-online

‚òÅÔ∏è Create your AstraDB instance:
https://github.com/DataStax-Academy/microservices-java-workshop-online#3-create-your-astra-instance
